translations: 超大星（等于 supergiant star）；超大物
超大的；超巨星的；最亮光度级的

sentences.sentence: Stars range in size from neutron stars, which can be only 12 miles (20 kilometers) wide, to supergiants roughly 1,000 times the diameter of the sun.
sentences.translation: 恒星的尺寸范围从仅有12英里宽(20公里)的中子星到大约1000倍太阳直径的超大恒星。

sentences.sentence: Stars range in size from neutron stars, which can be only 12 miles (20 kilometers) wide, to supergiants roughly 1, 000 times the diameter of the sun.
sentences.translation: 恒星的尺寸范围从仅有12英里宽(20公里)的中子星到大约1000倍太阳直径的超大恒星。
